biotools.summary:
Approach for pure ion chromatogram construction from liquid chromatography-mass spectrometry data using deep learning.
Extract PICs from raw data files directly and automatically. The DeepPIC method has already been integrated into the KPIC2 framework. The combination can provide the entire pipeline from raw data to discriminant models for metabolomic datasets.

bioschemas.name: DeepPIC
